heroSection.title: Websites for small and medium-sized businesses and clubs
heroSection.subtitle: I build websites quickly and efficiently using the latest web technologies. Whether you want a simple solution with a user-friendly system, or a custom website tailored to your needs, you can rely on my expertise.

skills.title: My tech-stack
skills.paragraph: This is my tech-stack. I use the best methods to ensure that the website is fast, modern and responsive.

website.top_paragraph: I create websites that are optimized for the best user experience and web traffic. The latest technology is used to ensure that your website is fast, secure, and responsive. As a professional website designer, I specialize in crafting stunning and functional websites that cater to your unique needs and goals.
website.middle_title: Why you should choose me as your website-developer...

bullitins.title: No middleman
bullitins.description: Normal this takes a big part of the budget, but not with me! A a final price is set before the project starts

bullitins.title: Project insight
bullitins.description: You get the opportunity to provide feedback throughout the entire development process to achieve the desired result.

bullitins.title: Secure and modern website
bullitins.description: To create a website that is secure, user-friendly, and scalable, the latest technology is used.

bullitins.title: User-friendly database
bullitins.description: If needed, a database will be integrated for you to manage your website content with.

bullitins.title: Search engine optimization
bullitins.description: You get more traffic to the site and make it easier to search for it on search engines.

bullitins.title: Full support
bullitins.description: You get taught how you can manage the content on your website by using a content management system.

bottom_paragraphs: With years of experience in the field, I understand the importance of a strong online presence in today's digital age. My services are tailored to individuals and businesses looking to establish or enhance their online footprint. I take a personalized approach to every project, ensuring that your website not only looks visually appealing but also functions seamlessly across devices.

Whether you're launching a brand-new website or looking to revamp your existing one, I'm here to turn your vision into a reality. From user-friendly navigation to eye-catching design elements, I pay meticulous attention to every detail. Let's work together to create a website that not only reflects your brand but also drives results and leaves a lasting impression on your visitors.

SEO.top_title: Need more visitors on your website?
SEO.top_paragraph: Looking to boost online visibility and drive traffic to your website? Our tailored SEO services are designed for your unique business goals. Whether it's achieving top rankings on Google or local market dominance, we specialize in keyword optimization, on/off-page SEO, and content enhancement. Plus, our transparent reporting lets you track progress and see tangible results.
SEO.middle_title: Why you should choose me upgrade your SEO...

bullitins.title: Customized SEO solutions
bullitins.description: Tailored to meet your specific business needs and goals.

bullitins.title: Higher search engine rankings
bullitins.description: Boost visibility on Google and ensure your website reaches your target audience.

bullitins.title: SEO-optimized content
bullitins.description: Improves content quality and relevance to engage both users and search engines.

bullitins.title: Local SEO expertise
bullitins.description: Attracts more local customers through targeted local SEO strategies.

bullitins.title: Increased website traffic
bullitins.description: SEO improvements that drive more visitors and make your site easier to find.

bullitins.title: SEO insights & reporting
bullitins.description: Track your SEO progress with detailed analytics and transparent reports.

bottom_paragraphs: Choosing me means success. We tailor SEO solutions exclusively for your business, improve your website's content and structure for higher rankings. Our expertise includes local SEO strategies, transparent reporting, and maximum online success. With me, you'll increase traffic and become more visible to users. Welcome to improving your online presence.

Don't let your website go unnoticed. Improve your online visibility, increase organic traffic, and enhance conversions with our expert SEO services. Contact us today to discuss how we can enhance your SEO strategy and elevate your business to new heights in the digital world.

webcontent.paragraph: Delivering engaging and impactful web content is my expertise. I understand that the content on your website plays a pivotal role in attracting and retaining visitors. With a passion for effective communication and a flair for creativity, I offer professional web content creation services to businesses and individuals looking to make a lasting impression online.
webcontent.middle_title: Why you should choose me as your webcontent-creator...

bullitins.title: Engaging content
bullitins.description: Captures your audience's attention and enhances user experience.

bullitins.title: Tailor-made solutions
bullitins.description: Content crafted to align with your unique business goals and needs.

bullitins.title: User-friendly design
bullitins.description: Visually appealing and easy-to-navigate content for your audience.

bullitins.title: Timely delivery
bullitins.description: Ensuring your content is ready when you need it.

bullitins.title: Responsive content
bullitins.description: Seamlessly adapts to various devices and screen sizes.

bullitins.title: Brand-building content
bullitins.description: Resonates with your audience, drives engagement, and builds loyalty.

bottom_paragraphs: With a passion for effective communication and a flair for creativity, I offer professional web content creation services to businesses and individuals looking to make a lasting impression online. My approach to content creation is tailored to your unique needs and objectives.

Whether you require compelling blog posts, informative articles, persuasive product descriptions, or engaging social media content, I have the skills to deliver. I conduct thorough research to ensure that the content is not only well-informed but also relevant to your target audience.

CMS.top_title: Get user-friendly control of your content on your website!
CMS.top_paragraph: By connecting a database to your website, you can easily change and add content to your website. The database is scalable and can be customized to your specific needs.
CMS.middle_title: Why you should choose me create a CMS for your website...

bullitins.title: Easy content management
bullitins.description: Update your content effortlessly without any technical knowledge. You decide what is displayed

bullitins.title: Scalable solution
bullitins.description: Designed to grow with your business and adapt to future needs.

bullitins.title: Customized to your needs
bullitins.description: Built to match your specific requirements for optimal functionality.

bullitins.title: Secure data storage
bullitins.description: Reliable storage and handling of sensitive information.

bullitins.title: Automatic backups
bullitins.description: Protects your content from loss and unexpected issues.

bullitins.title: Seamless integration
bullitins.description: Compatible with popular tools and third-party services.

bottom_paragraphs: Integrating a database for your website is a strategic step towards futher developing your company. Instead of manually updating the content on your website, you can easily manage it yourself. If you want to delegate content updates it can easily be achieved by adding multiple users to the CMS.

Either you need a CMS to manage images, text, blog posts, articles, website colors or even the websites design, I have the skills to do this. I am here to create a robust CMS that can be used for all your needs.

sosialmedia_integration.top_title: Show content from your social media on your website!
sosialmedia_integration.top_paragraph: By connecting your social media with your website, you can easily show content from your social media in a new and exiting way.
sosialmedia_integration.middle_title: Why you should choose me connect your social media with your website...

bullitins.title: Seamless platform integration
bullitins.description: Connects effortlessly with Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and more.

bullitins.title: Automatic content updates
bullitins.description: Syncs your social media content directly to your website.

bullitins.title: Time-saving synchronization
bullitins.description: Easily publish posts across multiple platforms without extra effort.

bullitins.title: Design-matched content
bullitins.description: Social media posts are styled to seamlessly match your website's design.

bullitins.title: No technical knowledge needed
bullitins.description: Easily display and manage content without any coding skills.

bullitins.title: Increased visibility
bullitins.description: Enhance your social media reach by sharing content across multiple platforms.

bottom_paragraphs: By connecting your sosial media with your website you can show your content in a new way. You can choose between showing the latest content, specific contant, or everything. This way you can manage the content on your own website.

Either you need an integration with social media to display images, text, blog posts, articles, videos, etc, I have the skills to do this. I will create a solution that you will be proud to show the world.

service_cards.title: Websites of the highest quality
service_cards.text: With design that follows the current trends and the latest the technology for a modern website.

service_cards.title: Search engine optimization
service_cards.text: Increase traffic to your website with a comprehensive range of SEO (Search Engine Optimization) services.

service_cards.title: Engaging webcontent
service_cards.text: Captivating experiences that combine powerful words with eye-catching visuals.

service_cards.title: Content Management System (CMS)
service_cards.text: Integrate a content management system so that you can manage your content on your website.

service_cards.title: Social media integration
service_cards.text: Connect your social media with your website to show content from your social media on a new and exciting way.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: With a passion for front-end development and a commitment to creating user-centric designs, I bring your vision to life. Explore the projects I've had the privilege to work on, each representing the blend of art and technology that defines my approach.

projects.name: Wileo AS
projects.jobDone: Created landing page and content for the website

projects.name: Hawii Analytics
projects.jobDone: Project Manager for building the new Hawii.no website.

projects.name: KVS - Kristensen Vedlikehold Service
projects.jobDone: New company homepage for KVS. Made with next.js

companies.name: Kodeverket Bergen
companies.jobDone: Here I worked as a project manager for building the website Hawii.no. We used Next.js, tailwind css and Sanity for this project

companies.name: Jobloop
companies.jobDone: In this job I worked as a course instructor for programming and coding in the period 2023-2024. I taught HTML, CSS, Javascipt, Figma, and React, along with a wide range of developer tools

companies.name: Villo development
companies.jobDone: My freelancer gig. I create everthing from simple personal sites to complex e-commerce platforms. In addition I also deliver webcontent and improve SEO for increasing traffic.

companies.name: Jobloop
companies.jobDone: In October 2024 I got promoted within Jobloop to a local course leader. My tasks extended to management, including more responsibility in regards to participants, course instructors and administrative work

showCaseList.paragraph: Engaging websites for your business: From simple to complex websites, tailored to all devices.

showCaseList.title: design
showCaseList.paragraph: Consistent design that is aesthetic and functional, with a focus on user-friendliness and conversion

showCaseList.title: development
showCaseList.paragraph: Expertise in developing websites that are easy to maintain and change content on

showCaseList.title: content
showCaseList.paragraph: Original high-quality content for your website, customized for your purpose and target audience

companyInfo.title: Norwegian web developer
companyInfo.paragraphOne: Seeing my services make a positive impact on a customer's business is what I love the most. My goal is to build strong, long-lasting, and valuable relationships with my customers. I do this by providing high-quality services and open communication throughout the work process
companyInfo.paragraphTwo: My vision is to create good websites for small and medium-sized businesses without it becoming too expensive, while still offering high quality with the latest web technologies, search engine optimization, and content.

introInfo.title: About me
introInfo.subtitle: Joakim Villo
introInfo.paragraph: I'm a trained developer who's currently a leader in programming and web development courses held here in Norway. I hold two bachelor's degrees in other fields, and previous work has been related to those degrees. In 2022, I switched to programming and coding, which has now become my true passion in life.

cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.why: This website uses cookies to improve your experience.
cookie.disclaimer: We do not store information that can identify you as a person. Cookies are stored for 1 year.
